summary: Comprehensive testing of admin panel overhaul - 9 features backend/frontend integration. Admin endpoints mostly functional, frontend properly hides admin access and shows correct UI elements.

critical_bugs.impact: Football data not loading, affects core prediction functionality

minor_bugs.issue: Search for 'SuperAdmin' returns no results - case sensitivity issue

ui_bugs.issue: Session tokens appear to expire quickly during testing

integration_issues.issue: Admin login works but sessions may not persist properly across page reloads

passed_tests: ✅ Admin access control - non-authenticated users redirected to login
✅ Admin panel UI - all 8 tabs present (Dashboard, Users, Matches, System, Prediction Monitor, Favorites, Notifications, Analytics)
✅ Dashboard stats display - total_users, active_users, system_status
✅ Header discrete access - shows 'Settings & Tools' instead of 'Admin Panel'
✅ Users tab filters - online/offline/banned filter chips working
✅ Users tab eye icons - message review functionality present
✅ Admin backend APIs - 20/25 admin endpoints working correctly
✅ Admin user management - ban/unban, password change, user detail APIs
✅ System APIs management - list, add, toggle, activate endpoints
✅ Prediction streaks monitoring - working with configurable thresholds
✅ Analytics and audit logging - comprehensive admin activity tracking
✅ Authorization control - non-admin users get 403 for most admin endpoints

critical: Fix football matches API - currently returning 0 matches instead of 100+
Investigate session persistence issues - admin sessions expire quickly
medium: Fix WebSocket routing - endpoints returning 404/405 errors
Fix admin users search case sensitivity issue
Test admin panel with stable authentication to verify all UI interactions
low: Verify all 9 admin features work end-to-end with persistent login
